name: Spooky Men
description:
You have just moved into a new house, excited to start your new life. However, as you're settling into your new home, you realize you've forgotten some important items and unfinished tasks at your old, haunted house. Determined to retrieve your belongings and complete your tasks, you head back to the haunted house to face your fears and confront whatever haunts the place.

At the start of the game, one player will be randomly chosen to play as the ghostly presence in the house. The rest of the players will play as the humans, working together to collect items and complete tasks while avoiding the ghostly presence.

The game features a variety of gameplay mechanics, including exploration, stealth, and survival elements. As you and your friends navigate the house, you must collect items that will help you avoid the ghost and complete your tasks. You can use various items found throughout the house to distract the ghost or hide from it.

The ghostly presence can use supernatural powers to scare and attack you. The ghost player can also set traps to catch you, making it even more challenging to survive. The ghost player can see and hear everything that's happening in the house, and can use this information to plan and execute their attacks.

As the game progresses, the ghostly presence will become stronger and more aggressive, making it harder for you and your friends to complete your tasks and escape the house. Additionally, the game has a feature where the lights can randomly turn off due to high power usage or random events, adding a level of unpredictability and increasing the challenge.

Overall, the game provides a challenging and atmospheric experience that will keep you and your friends on the edge of your seat as you explore the haunted house, confront your fears, and try to survive the ghostly presence that lurks within.

2-4 Player Online Co-op

Experience the ultimate cooperative survival-horror game with 2-4 player online co-op in a haunted house.

Playing as Human

Human objective is to work together with your teammates to retrieve items and complete tasks before escaping the haunted house.

Playing as Ghost

Ghost objective is to eliminate all other players. Using supernatural abilities and stealth tactics, the ghost can manipulate the environment and stalk their prey.

Unique gameplay experience

Items spawn in random locations. With each playthrough, the game generates a unique experience where you and your friends must work together to find the items you need to complete your tasks and escape.
